name: SUV Trucks Parking Madness Free Game
name_original: SUV Trucks Parking Madness Free Game
description:
=================
*** $0.99 -> $0.00! ***
=================

PLAY NOW>>>>>>>>>>>

Love BIG CARS? We too! Manage quickly passing SUV cars carefully placing them in their garages. All of our game levels are FREE including all of the awesome crossovers that are ready to be parked.

Every SUV has a distinctive color, quickly move them around the parking lot to the same colored garage, so they won’t collide with other SUVs trying to park.

But wait, it’s not as easy as it sounds. Other crossovers need to use the roads in the parking lot too, so be sure to be quick in parking before they crash into each other.

Let this game blow your mind away! As the game progresses, the difficulty also increases. It’s a fun, challenging game that’s sure to entertain you for hours.

Avoid disaster on the racing track by making sure that the SUVs go to the right parking spots because if they don’t, the game goes back to zero and you have to start all over again.

Are you ready? Download this game today and play away!

*** Game Features***

• Realistic Environment
• Super Easy Controls
• Great Graphics
• Guaranteed Hours of Fun

*** REMINDER ***

Be careful parking your SUV in real life and don’t play while driving!

=======================
*** DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE ***
=======================
